title: Mastering Squats and Other Essential Leg Exercises

content.text: Squats are one of the most effective exercises for building lower body strength. This guide will cover how to master squats and include other key leg exercises.
Squats target multiple muscle groups including your quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes. They help build muscle mass and improve overall stability.

items: Burns calories and supports fat loss

content.text: In addition to squats, including other leg exercises like lunges, leg presses, and calf raises can further enhance your leg workout routine.

items: Lunges: Great for balance and targeting multiple muscle groups.
Leg Press: Focuses on the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
Calf Raises: Builds strength in your calves and improves ankle stability.
